meanings.sent1: She felt the cold wind tinglingly on her skin.
meanings.sent2: The spicy food made his mouth tingle tinglingly.
meanings.sent3: The ticklish feather danced tinglingly on his nose.
meanings.sent4: The anticipation of the surprise gift made her heart beat tinglingly.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the bell echoed tinglingly in the quiet room.

meanings.sent1: The tinglingly sensation in her fingers made her smile.
meanings.sent2: The icy water left a tinglingly feeling on his skin.
meanings.sent3: The unexpected compliment brought a tinglingly warmth to her cheeks.
meanings.sent4: The thrilling roller coaster ride was a tinglingly experience.
meanings.sent5: The exciting news sent a tinglingly wave of happiness through her body.
